author: cnbc.com
title: American States Water posts 4Q profit
text:
SAN DIMAS, Calif. (AP) _ American States Water Co. (AWR) on Monday reported fourth-quarter earnings of $12.9 million.
The San Dimas, California-based company said it had profit of 35 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for pretax expenses, were 36 cents per share.
The water and electric utility posted revenue of $104.2 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported profit of $69.4 million, or $1.88 per share. Revenue was reported as $440.6 million.
American States Water shares have dropped slightly more than 5 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Monday, shares hit $54.83, a rise of 22 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on AWR at https://www.zacks.com/ap/AWR
